amendment.description: To restore funding for certain programs under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.

action.text: Amendment SA 1559 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1559 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 46 - 49. Record Vote Number: 325.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1559.

Amendment SA 1559 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11057-11062, S11077; text: CR S11057) To restore funding for certain programs under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1559 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 46 - 49. Record Vote Number: 325.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1559 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 1542.
